Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Damen due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Damen due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
